info.title: TTS (Text-to-Speech) and Avatar API
info.description: This REST API provides resources for generating speech or avatar video from text or pre-signed URLs.

get.description: This endpoint provides the list of all available voices for the user's enterprise.
This endpoint provides the list of all available avatars for the user's enterprise.

post.description: This endpoint generates speech from a transcript. You can provide the transcript either as plain text or a pre-signed URL. The response will include a job ID and a status URL for tracking the job.

requestBody.description: The request body contains the transcript used for generating speech.

post.description: This endpoint generates an avatar video from a transcript. You can provide the transcript either as plain text or a pre-signed URL. The response will include a job ID and a status URL for tracking the job.

requestBody.description: The request body contains the transcript and details for generating an avatar.

get.summary: Get the status of a job
get.description:
Provides the status and result of an asynchronous TTS and Avatar job.

Use this endpoint with the stage environment URL for stage enviornment status and results.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID of an asynchronous TTS and Avatar job.

voiceId.description: The unique ID for the voice.

displayName.description: The displayed name for the voice.

style.description: The speaking style of the voice.

status.description: This determines if the specific voice ID is available for use. Deprecated voices will have an Inactive status.

extendedPropertyMap.description: This is a field for any additional properties for the voice.

wordsPerMinute.description: The speed of speaking, in words per minute.

sampleURL.description: A pre-signed URL for downloading the sample audio.

avatarId.description: The unique ID for the avatar.

displayName.description: The displayed name for the avatar.

clothingStyle.description: The clothing style worn by the avatar.

ageGroup.description: The intended age bracket of the avatar.

style.description: This property is used when the avatar wears a professional or region-specific costume (like Nurse, Doctor, Emergency Worker, Retail Worker, etc.).

status.description: This determines if the specific avatar ID is available for use. Deprecated avatars will have an Inactive status.

extendedPropertyMap.description: This is a field for any additional properties for the avatar.

hd.description: A pre-signed URL for downloading the high-resolution avatar thumbnail.

lowRes.description: A pre-signed URL for downloading the low-resolution avatar thumbnail.

voiceId.description: The unique ID for the voice.

webm.description: A pre-signed URL for downloading avatar sample video in WEBM format.

mp4.description: A pre-signed URL for downloading avatar sample video in MP4 format.

SupportedLanguageCode.description: The language code for the supported language desired in the result.

SupportedAudioOutputAudioFormat.description: The supported audio format for output.

SupportedOutputVideoFormat.description: The supported video format for background video for Avatar.

SupportedBackgroundType.description: Supported background type for output Avatar video.

mediaType.description: The format of the text resource.

voiceId.description: ID of the voice to use from the catalog of voices.

mediaType.description: The format of the text resource.

voiceId.description: ID of the voice to use from the catalog of voices.

avatarId.description: ID of the avatar to use from the catalog of avatars.
ID of the avatar to use from the catalog of avatars.

url.description: The pre-signed URL pointing to the resource to be used for avatar/speech generation.
The pre-signed URL pointing to the resource to be used for avatar/speech generation.

color.description: For color as background of output, it should be six digit hexadecimal value

voices.sampleURL: <pre-signed url for downloading the sample audio>

thumbnailUrls.hd: <pre-signed url for downloading HD avatar thumbnail>
thumbnailUrls.lowRes: <pre-signed url for downloading low resolution avatar thumbnail>

sampleVideo.webm: <pre-signed url for downloading the avatar sample video in WEBM format>
sampleVideo.mp4: <pre-signed url for downloading the avatar sample video in MP4 format>
